PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FlowMeterTypeWaterMeter
PropertySetDef.Definition: Device that measures, indicates and sometimes records, the volume of water that passes through it without interrupting the flow.

PropertyDef.Name: Type
PropertyDef.Definition: A symbol designator with content according to local standards, e.g. 'BycycleCrossing', 'RoadStuds', 'SpeedBump', 'TransverseBar', 'BusStop', 'Chevron', 'Hatched', 'KeepClear', 'BoxJunction', 'EmergencyExit', 'Intersection', 'Junction'

PropertyDef.Name: ConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the size of inlet and outlet pipe connections to the meter.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum rate of flow which the meter is expected to pass.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumPressureLoss
PropertyDef.Definition: Pressure loss expected across the meter under conditions of maximum flow.

PropertyDef.Name: BackflowPreventerType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the type of backflow preventer installed to prevent the backflow of contaminated or polluted water from an irrigation/reticulation system to a potable water supply.
